name: Tips

pages.text: $(li)§aAutomation is key!§r$(li)§aAlways craft extras.§r$(li)No more capturing Ghasts for the §nAngel Ring§r!$(li)Go through the Controls. Lots of mods have features that need to be bound to a key.$(li)§aNever spend 6 minutes doing something by hand when you can spend 6 hours to automate it.§r
pages.title: Tips

pages.text: $(li)§3Mekanism Cables§r tend to cause lag, be careful not to overuse them.$(li)Press §lBackspace§r to go to the previous recipe in JEI.$(li)Instead of using filled §nbuckets§r in recipes, you can use filled §nPortable Tanks§r for batch crafting.
pages.title: Tips

pages.text: $(li)Beware the effects of poor §2nutrition§r (Hotkey N). Seemingly random debuffs can stem from a bad diet.$(li)To loot a dragon, §lright-click§r it with an empty hand.$(li)Keep your §nitem cables§r short. Not only does it speed up the overall transfer, it is also easier on the server.
pages.title: Tips

pages.text: $(li)Use §lF7§r to see the light levels, §lF9§r to see the chunk borders, and §lCtrl+B§r to see the biome borders.$(li)Press §lShift/Sneak§r over your grave to retrieve your items.$(li)Holding the §oDrawer Key§r in your off-hand will automatically lock a newly placed Storage Drawer.
pages.title: Tips

pages.text: $(li)The Immersive Petroleum §nPumpjack§r needs an Immersive Engineering §nFluid Pipe§r to bedrock to function.$(li)§nMob Spawners§r can be moved by using a §nDrop Of Evil§r on them, or by carrying them. (§lRight-shift + Click§r by default)
pages.title: Tips

pages.text: $(li)§lStarlight Transmutation§r gives you access to §nEnd Stone§r without ever going to The End.$(li)You can put the Astral Sorcery §nLinking Wand§r in your offhand, and it won't stop linking.$(li)§e/xu_powersharing§r allows you to share Extra Utilities §4Grid Power§r with anyone on your server.
pages.title: Tips

pages.text: $(li)§e/foodlist size§r shows you how many different foods you already ate.$(li)§e/undo_excavation§r can undo §6Ore Excavator§r$(li)§e/wandOops§r can undo the §6Better Builder's Wand§r$(li)§lAstral Sorcery Rituals§r (and linked Ritual Anchors) act as §lChunkloaders§r.

pages.text: $(li)§lHorologium§r only appears every 36 days, the next night after a §lSolar Eclipse§r.$(li)§5Mystical Agriculture§r plants have a 5%% chance of dropping §52 seeds§r when harvested with left click.$(li)There are many different valid fuels for the Tinkers' Construct §nSmeltery§r, all with different attributes.
pages.title: Tips

pages.text: $(li)§nPile of Ashes§r from the Nether are a great early game fuel source.$(li)The §nAkashic Tome§r is a portable bookshelf capable of holding all of your informational books and guides.$(li)A 13x13x13 §nCompact Machine§r is large enough for all of your §dThaumcraft§r needs, and will prevent flux from spreading to your base.
pages.title: Tips

pages.text: $(li)Growing §nSugar Cane§r on §oFertile Soil§r or §oFertilized Dirt§r does not require an adjacent water source.$(li)Under NO circumstances activate §lVeinminer§r while working around §lAE2 networks§r!$(li)§lMob Farms§r will lag less if spread out over a large area. The main load comes from mobs pathing away from each other.
pages.title: Tips

pages.text: $(li)§2NuclearCraft§r machines automatically convert Mekanism §6gasses§r into their fluid forms, and vice-versa.$(li)Utilize the §lQuark chest buttons§r in your inventory! They help a lot with early game storage management.
pages.title: Tips

pages.text: $(li)Applied Energistics §nInterfaces§r are grouped together by their name in the §nInterface Terminal§r (can be named in an anvil).$(li)The §nAdvanced Morphing Tool§r (Morphing Tool crafted with 4 gears) is a good way to get all wrenches early. It also helps to keep your inventory neat.

pages.text: $(li)The Cyclic §nSack of Holding§r can move Collector Crystals from Astral Sorcery §8(only for decoration purposes)§r.$(li)§nDrawers§r can be accessed via the Cooking For Blockheads §nFloor§r.$(li)A §nSkeleton§r that falls in Witch Water becomes a §nWither Skeleton§r. §nSquid§r -> §nGhast§r.
